description:
Ultimate Puzzle Adventure: Kitties is a captivating puzzle game featuring 60 adorable kitty images. With three different game modes, you can choose the number of pieces for each puzzle and enjoy all levels unlocked from the beginning, allowing you to play at your own pace.

 ■ Select from three different game modes.
 ■ Choose the number of pieces for each puzzle.
 ■ All levels are unlocked from the start for flexible gameplay.
 ■ Enjoy 60 unique and adorable kitty images.
name: Ultimate Puzzle Adventure: Kitties
intro: Dive into Ultimate Puzzle Adventure: Kitties with 60 playable images and three game modes. Customize your puzzle piece count and enjoy unlocked levels from the start.
